title: Use Public Transport
description: Reduce your carbon footprint by using public transport instead of driving alone.

title: Switch to LED Bulbs
description: LED bulbs consume less energy and last longer than traditional bulbs.

title: Compost Organic Waste
description: Turn food scraps into natural fertilizer to reduce landfill waste.

title: Take Shorter Showers
description: Save water by limiting your shower time to under 5 minutes.

title: Use Reusable Bags
description: Avoid single-use plastics by carrying reusable shopping bags.

title: Unplug Devices
description: Turn off appliances and electronics when not in use to save energy.

title: Eat Less Meat
description: Incorporate more plant-based meals into your diet to reduce emissions from meat production.

title: Collect Rainwater
description: Use rainwater for watering plants or cleaning outdoor spaces.

title: Carpool with Colleagues
description: Share rides with colleagues to reduce fuel consumption and emissions.

title: Buy Local Produce
description: Support local farmers and reduce the carbon footprint of transported goods.
